name: @dadi/passport
description: A library for generating access tokens to authenticate with DADI platform components

scripts.test: env NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --report cobertura --report text --report html --report lcov ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: DADI <team@dadi.tech>
